mapper.select: /* kr.fingate.gs.cmsn.prdct.dao.PrdctDao.getPrdctEvltnStdList / 평가업적산출기준 */ SELECT RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE , PRDCT_RATE_SEQ , PYMNT_PERIOD , STD_CHANGE_RATE , INSRN_CHANGE_RATE , PRDCT_CHANGE_RATE , PERIOD_CHANGE_RATE FROM TB_PRDCT_EVLTN_STD_LIST WHERE RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE = #{rprsnPrdctCode} AND PRDCT_RATE_SEQ = #{prdctRateSeq}

/* kr.fingate.gs.cmsn.prdct.dao.PrdctDao.getPrdctExtpyAdjstList / 수당유형별 조정율 */ SELECT PEA.RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE , PEA.PRDCT_RATE_SEQ , PEA.EXTPY_TYPE , PEA.EVLTN_ADJST_RATE , PEA.PRDCT_ADJST_RATE , PEA.INSRR_ADJST_APLCT_YN , PEA.EX_ADPAY_RATE , PEA.EX_ADPAY_TIMES FROM TB_PRDCT_EXTPY_ADJST PEA, TB_CODE C WHERE PEA.RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE = #{rprsnPrdctCode} AND PEA.PRDCT_RATE_SEQ = #{prdctRateSeq} AND PEA.EXTPY_TYPE = C.CODE_ID AND C.CODE_INIT = 'EXTPY_TYPE' ORDER BY C.PRNT_ODER

/* kr.fingate.gs.cmsn.prdct.dao.PrdctDao.selPrdctIrch / 보험사환산 */ SELECT RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE , PRDCT_RATE_SEQ , IRCH_SEQ , IRCH_RATE_STD , PYMNT_PERIOD , IRCH_RATE1 , IRCH_RATE2 , IRCH_RATE3 FROM TB_PRDCT_IRCH WHERE RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE = #{rprsnPrdctCode} AND PRDCT_RATE_SEQ = #{prdctRateSeq}

/* kr.fingate.gs.cmsn.prdct.dao.PrdctDao.getPrdctPymntAlarmList / 지급액공시 */ SELECT RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE , PRDCT_RATE_SEQ , REG_CHANGE_YN , REG_CHANGE_RATE , RESULT_ADJST_RATE , EX_ADPAY_TIMES , EX_ADPAY_TIMS2 , TOTAL_PYMNT_TIMES , TOTAL_PYMNT_TIMS2 , DFNTN_YN , ALARM_MEMO -- , REG_DATE -- , REG_USER_NO FROM TB_PRDCT_PYMNT_ALARM WHERE RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE = #{rprsnPrdctCode} AND PRDCT_RATE_SEQ = #{prdctRateSeq}

/* kr.fingate.gs.cmsn.prdct.dao.PrdctDao.getPrdctPymntFigureList / 상품조정율 */ SELECT RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE , PRDCT_RATE_SEQ , PYMNT_PERIOD , PYMNT_RATE1 , PYMNT_RATE2 , PYMNT_RATE3 , OA_HOLD_RATE , PYMNT_ADJST_RATE , PYMNT_ALARM_RATE FROM TB_PRDCT_PYMNT_FIGURE WHERE RPRSN_PRDCT_CODE = #{rprsnPrdctCode} AND PRDCT_RATE_SEQ = #{prdctRateSeq}
